myutils.sith.trans_xyz.log2xyz(finput, foutput=None)[source]

Extract the configuration of minumum energy in optimization process in a xyz file from a .log gaussian file.

Parameters:

  • finput (str) – path to the log file.

  • foutput (str (optional)) – name of the output file without extension.

  • Note (if foutput is not given, the name output will be the same than the) –

  • extension. (input but with xyz) –
